attributes.action: Provide clearer information to the public on the calculation of interest rates for loans.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Calls for interest rate caps usually quote a specific figure without reference to the nature of the loan and clearly without an understanding of how the APR is calculated and the effect of the loan period on that calculation.

For example a loan of £100 paid back in 5 instalments of £21 gives a £5 profit to the lender but the APR for 5 weekly payments is 134%, whereas that for 5 monthly payments is 21.7%
